programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Relive the 2003 Australian Grand Prix which was held in Melbourne. A British driver claimed the final victory of his career after a disastrous error from a normally composed racer. It was an afternoon to forget for Michael Schumacher and Ferrari. The German missed out on a podium finish for the first time since 2001, while his constructor didn't have a driver in the top three for the first time since 1999. Juan Pablo Montoya appeared on course to seal Williams' first win of the year, before making an uncharacteristic error with eight laps remaining.
